trans-unit.source: Allows you to set the settings of a UDP transport.
trans-unit.target: 允许您设置 UDP 传输的设置。

trans-unit.source: These properties can be used to modify the setting on the underlying UDP transport as required by the application.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性可以用于修改基础 UDP 传输所需的应用程序上的设置。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.UdpTransportSettingsElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.UdpTransportSettingsElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.DuplicateMessageHistoryLength*> property in a UDP transport configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.DuplicateMessageHistoryLength*>UDP 传输配置元素中的属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.DuplicateMessageHistoryLength*>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of message hashes used by the transport to identify duplicate messages.
trans-unit.target: 最大传输用于标识重复消息的消息哈希数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a maximum allotment, in bytes, of memory for the process of reading and writing pages of data into memory from the disk.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大配额，以字节为单位的读取和写入到内存中磁盘的数据页的进程的内存。

trans-unit.source: A number that indicates the size of a buffer pool.
trans-unit.target: 一个数字，指示缓冲区池的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MaxMulticastRetransmitCount*> property in a UDP transport configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MaxMulticastRetransmitCount*>UDP 传输配置元素中的属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MaxMulticastRetransmitCount*>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times a multicast message can be retransmitted.
trans-unit.target: 可重新传输多播的消息的最大次数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MaxPendingMessageCount*> property in a UDP transport configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MaxPendingMessageCount*>UDP 传输配置元素中的属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MaxPendingMessageCount*>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of messages that are received but not yet removed from the input queue for an individual channel instance.
trans-unit.target: 最大已接收但尚未从单个通道实例的输入队列中移除的消息数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the MaxReceivedMessageSize property in a UDP transport configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 UDP 传输配置元素中的 MaxReceivedMessageSize 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in bytes, for a message that can be processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 最大大小，以字节为单位，可以由绑定处理的消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MaxUnicastRetransmitCount*> property in a UDP transport configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MaxUnicastRetransmitCount*>UDP 传输配置元素中的属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MaxUnicastRetransmitCount*>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times a unicast message can be retransmitted.
trans-unit.target: 可重新传输单播消息的最大次数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MulticastInterfaceId*> property in a UDP transport configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MulticastInterfaceId*>UDP 传输配置元素中的属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.MulticastInterfaceId*>

trans-unit.source: The network adapter that is used when sending and receiving multicast traffic on multi-honed machines.
trans-unit.target: 发送和接收多播的流量在多宿主计算机上时使用的网络适配器。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.SocketReceiveBufferSize*> property in a UDP transport configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.SocketReceiveBufferSize*>UDP 传输配置元素中的属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings.SocketReceiveBufferSize*>

trans-unit.source: The receive buffer size on the underlying WinSock socket.
trans-unit.target: 基础 WinSock 套接字的接收缓冲区大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the TimeToLive property in a UDP transport configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 UDP 传输配置元素中的 TimeToLive 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The number of network segment hops that a multicast packet can traverse.
trans-unit.target: 多播的数据包可以遍历的网络段跃点数。
